title: Restored Executive Control
description: Leadership can see what runs where, what is changing, and what evidence supports each decision.

title: Reduced Platform Risk
description: Dependency is reduced capability by capability instead of betting the business on a single replacement event.

title: Faster Adaptation
description: Teams can adjust processes and policies without reopening the entire platform debate every quarter.

title: Evidence That Stands Up
description: Controls, reconciliations, and cutovers produce documentation that holds up to audit, diligence, and review.
